methods: abstract List<Header> formatCookies(List<Cookie> cookies) Create "Cookie" headers for an array of Cookies.
abstract int getVersion() Returns version of the state management this cookie specification conforms to.
abstract Header getVersionHeader() Returns a request header identifying what version of the state management specification is understood.
abstract boolean match(Cookie cookie, CookieOrigin origin) Determines if a Cookie matches the target location.
abstract List<Cookie> parse(Header header, CookieOrigin origin) Parse the "Set-Cookie" Header into an array of Cookies.
abstract void validate(Cookie cookie, CookieOrigin origin) Validate the cookie according to validation rules defined by the cookie specification.
